text: int main ( ) { long long int a , b , i , * x , c = 0 , d = 0 ; scanf ( "%lld" , & a ) ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= a ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%lld" , & b ) ; x = ( long long int * ) malloc ( sizeof ( long long int ) * b ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < b ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%lld" , & ( * ( x + i ) ) ) ; } for ( i = 0 ; i <= ( b - 2 ) ; i ++ ) { if ( ( * ( x + i ) ) > ( * ( x + ( i + 1 ) ) ) ) { c = ( * ( x + ( i + 1 ) ) ) + c ; } else { d = ( * ( x + i ) ) + d ; } } printf ( "%lld\n" , c + d ) ; d = 0 ; c = 0 ; } return 0 ; }
